name: fit-ui-dev
description: Fit.UI is an object oriented JavaScript based UI framework for building rich web applications

scripts.test: cd build && ./Merge umd minify && cd .. && concurrently "node node_modules/http-server/bin/http-server" "sleep 1 && ./node_modules/opn/xdg-open http://localhost:8080/Test"
scripts.debug: cd Debug && ./prepare && cd .. && concurrently "node node_modules/http-server/bin/http-server -c-1" "sleep 1 && ./node_modules/opn/xdg-open http://localhost:8080/Debug"

author: Jimmy Thomsen
